mapper.sql: c_id, G_name, G_fid, G_R_time, G_M_time, W_uid, G_icon, G_state
mapper.insert: insert into G_column ( c_id,G_name, G_fid, G_R_time, G_M_time, W_uid, G_icon, G_state) values ( c_id,#{g_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{g_fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{g_R_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{g_M_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{w_uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{g_icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{g_state,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into G_column
c_id,
G_name,
G_fid,
G_R_time,
G_M_time,
W_uid,
G_icon,
G_state,
#{c_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{g_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{g_fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{g_R_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{g_M_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{g_state,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update G_column
G_name = #{g_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
G_fid = #{g_fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
G_R_time = #{g_R_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
G_M_time = #{g_M_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
W_uid = #{w_uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
G_icon = #{g_icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
G_state = #{g_state,jdbcType=BIT},
where c_id = #{c_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update G_column set G_name = #{g_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, G_fid = #{g_fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, G_R_time = #{g_R_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, G_M_time = #{g_M_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, W_uid = #{w_uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, G_icon = #{g_icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, G_state = #{g_state,jdbcType=BIT} where c_id = #{c_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select ,u.nickName from G_column t left join sys_user u on t.W_uid = u.id where G_state=1 order by t.G_R_time desc
limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(0) from G_column where
G_state=1
